alert.note: Alert for Allen; Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:55PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rapides, east central Vernon and northeastern Allen Parishes through 445 PM CDT... At 355 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Leander, or near Hineston, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oakdale, Glenmora, Elizabeth, Calcasieu, Mcnary and Union Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
